actions.text: Committee on Appropriations; Senate Subcommittee on Transportation. Hearings held prior to introduction and/or referral. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-34.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Appropriations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Related Agencies

official_title: A bill to promote job creation and economic recovery through investment in transportation infrastructure, and for other purposes.
short_title: Supplemental Transportation Appropriations Reinvestment to Upgrade Productivity (Start-Up) Act of 1993

summary.text: Supplemental Transportation Appropriations Reinvestment to Upgrade Productivity (Start-Up) Act of 1993 - Makes supplemental appropriations for FY 1993 to: (1) the Department of Transportation's Federal Highway Administration and Federal Transit Administration to maintain and repair the Nation's highways and bridges, stimulate economic activity, and expand the efficiency of public transportation systems; (2) the Federal Aviation Administration for airport improvement programs; and (3) the Federal Railroad Administration for Northeast Corridor improvements.

titles.title: Supplemental Transportation Appropriations Reinvestment to Upgrade Productivity (Start-Up) Act of 1993
A bill to promote job creation and economic recovery through investment in transportation infrastructure, and for other purposes.
